summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing various shipping charges incurred between April and May 2001. It includes information about transportation charges, discounts, and special handling fees, along with specific details about packages sent by Epstein during this period.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 21, 2001, and details shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD 571.05.
The invoice includes multiple package pickups and deliveries to various recipients.
Several recipients listed on the invoice are associated with Epstein, indicating potential business relationships.
There are mentions of additional handling surcharges and fuel surcharges applicable to the shipments.
